meta.note: PR22 documentation-only update; no prompt changes.
meta.data_contract_update: Default retrieval metadata predicates and 3-year date scope documented.
meta.summarization_schema: Compaction snapshot contract and deterministic narrative template documented in spec.
meta.external_memory_architecture: External memory architecture documented (local Postgres + run-addressed filesystem, retention, authoritative stores, pointer semantics).

meta.runtime_guardrails: Runtime guardrails documented (tool I/O caps, zero-result guidance, loop guard, schema repair).
meta.cache_stability: Cache stability optimization documented (immutable cached prefix, deterministic serialization, provider breakpoints).
